00114         simple_date::simple_date( year y, month m, int day )
00115         {
00116                 validate( y, m, day );
00117 
00118                 int yr = y.value;
00119                 int mth = int( m ) + 1;
00120 
00121                 if( mth < 3 )
00122                 {
00123                         --yr;
00124                         mth += 12;
00125                 }
00126                 
00127                 int a = yr / 100;
00128                 int b = a / 4;
00129                 int c = 2 - a + b;
00130                 int d = day;
00131                 int e = static_cast< int >( 365.25 * ( yr + 4716.0 ) );
00132                 int f = static_cast< int >( 30.6001 * ( mth + 1 ) );
00133 
00134                 julian = c + d + e + f - 1524.5;
00135         }

00143     /* This could be improved by storing the year part having either obtained
00144      * it in a constructor, or calculated it once.
00145      */
00146         year simple_date::get_year() const
00147         {
00148                 int y, m, d;
00149                 convert( julian, y, m, d );
00150                 return year( y );
00151         }

00159     /* This could be improved by storing the month part having either obtained
00160      * it in a constructor, or calculated it once.

00162         month simple_date::get_month() const
00163         {
00164                 int y, m, d;
00165                 convert( julian, y, m, d );
00166                 return static_cast< month >( m );
00167         }

00174     /* This could be improved by storing the day part having either obtained

00177         int simple_date::get_day() const
00178         {
00179                 int y, m, d;
00180                 convert( julian, y, m, d );
00181                 return d;

00189         day_of_week simple_date::get_day_of_week() const
00190         {
00191                 return static_cast< day_of_week >( static_cast< int >( julian + 2 ) % 7 );
00192         }

00259         int to_iso_date( const simple_date & date )
00260         {
00261                 return date.get_year().value * 10000 + ( date.get_month() + 1 ) * 100 + date.get_day();
00262         }
00263 
00264         bool is_leap_year( year y )
00265         {
00266                 return y.value % 100 == 0 ? y.value % 400 == 0 : y.value % 4 == 0;
00267         }
00268

00271         void convert( double jul, int & y, int & m, int & d )
00272         {
00273                 int z = static_cast< int >( jul + 0.5 );
00274                 int w = static_cast< int >( ( z - 1867216.25 ) / 36524.25 );
00275                 int x = w / 4;
00276                 int a = z + 1 + w - x;
00277                 int b = a + 1524;
00278                 int c = static_cast< int >( ( b - 122.1 ) / 365.25 );
00279                 int d1 = static_cast< int >( 365.25 * c );
00280                 int e = static_cast< int >( ( b - d1 ) / 30.6001 );
00281                 int f = static_cast< int >( 30.6001 * e );
00282 
00283                 d = b - d1 - f;
00284                 m = e - 1;
00285                 if( m > 12 )
00286                 {
00287                         m -= 12;
00288                 }
00289 
00290                 if( m < 3 )
00291                 {
00292                         y = c - 4715;
00293                 }
00294                 else
00295                 {
00296                         y = c - 4716;
00297                 }
00298                 --m;
00299         }
00300 
00301 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00302 
00303         void validate( year y, month m, int day )
00304         {
00305                 if( y.value < 1582 )
00306                 {
00307                         throw date_exception( "Year too early - epoch error" );
00308                 }
00309                 if( m < 0 || m > 11 )
00310                 {
00311                         throw date_exception( "Invalid month" );
00312                 }
00313                 
00314                 int upper = 31;
00315                 switch( m )
00316                 {
00317                 case feb:
00318                         upper = is_leap_year( y ) ? 29 : 28;
00319                         break;
00320 
00321                 case apr:
00322                 case jun:
00323                 case sep:               
00324                 case nov:
00325                         upper = 30;
00326                         break;
00327 
00328                 case jan:
00329                 case mar:
00330                 case may:
00331                 case jul:
00332                 case aug:
00333                 case oct:
00334                 case dec:
00335                 default:
00336                         break;
00337                 }
00338                 if( day > upper || day < 1 )
00339                 {
00340                         throw date_exception( "Day in month out of range" );
00341                 }
00342         }
